sentences.en: A virtuous person may be rendered vicious by encephalitics lethargica.
sentences.cn: 有道德的人患了昏睡性脑炎可能变得不讲道德.

sentences.en: Athens had turned against its most brilliant and virtuous citizen.
sentences.cn: 雅典把矛头指向其最有才有德的人.

sentences.en: He described that pure and unsensual heaven destined to the virtuous.
sentences.cn: 他描述了为有德行的所命定的那个纯洁、无邪欲的天堂.

sentences.en: I cleaned the flat, which left me feeling virtuous.
sentences.cn: 我打扫了整个公寓，这让我觉得自己很了不起。

sentences.en: My darling, what can be virtuous or sinful about buying a chicken?
sentences.cn: 我亲爱的, 买只鸡的事还能谈得上什么善恶 么 ?

sentences.en: People who get up early feel virtuous all morning and sleepy all afternoon.
sentences.cn: 起床早的人上午精神抖擞,而整个下午却无精打采.

sentences.en: She loved her cousin, and knew her virtuous principles.
sentences.cn: 她很爱她的堂妹, 她知道她堂妹素日品行端正.

sentences.en: She was such a virtuous woman that everybody respected her.
sentences.cn: 她是个有道德的女性,人人都尊敬她.

sentences.en: Suddenly Spring Moon wished she had not been so virtuous at tea.
sentences.cn: 春月忽然懊悔起来,她不该在喝茶时那么端庄有礼.

sentences.en: Sue considered herself very virtuous because she neither drank nor smoked.
sentences.cn: 休认为自己品行非常端正，因为她既不喝酒也不抽烟。

sentences.en: The choice was simple, and virtuous. "
sentences.cn: 我的抉择很简单, 也很合乎道德. ”

sentences.en: The man who is to be happy will therefore need virtuous friends.
sentences.cn: 因此,向往幸福的人需要品格高尚的挚友.

sentences.en: They parade their virtuous beliefs and hide their vices.
sentences.cn: 他们大秀美德并掩盖自己的罪恶。
只有正直的人才有朋友.

sentences.en: When one is surrounded by the virtuous, he'll become upright himself.
sentences.cn: 蓬生麻中, 不扶自直.

trans.tran_cn: 有道德的，有德行的，善良的，贞洁的，有效力的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a very honest and moral way
